name: Deadly Mortal Bloody Hot Dogs of Destiny!!
name_original: Deadly Mortal Bloody Hot Dogs of Destiny!!
description:
Two sausages enter, only one live ... cof cof... leaves!

Will you become the winner or the delicious main event of a hot dog?!

Find out, as you fight as tribute to the Hot Dog King (actually just a dog), in the arena of doom!

-------------
@spotik - > Code + Sound
@roh42 - > Code + Art + Music

Made for the Hot Dog Jam 2017, Hope you all like it!
